Sentencas: A comprehensive thermal fluid electrochemistry model for the analysis of the electrochemical performance and a thermal mechanical model for the analysis of the mechanical behavior of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (mtSOFC) are presented.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Material properties for the models are determined by the available theory and experiment and linked to the compositions and microstructures of the materials.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Good agreement between the theoretical and experimental I-V relations is obtained.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mode is used to examine the effects of various parameters on the electrochemical and mechanical performance of mtSOFC.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Collecting current from both sides of the anode is found to significantly increase the cell output.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Increasing the Ni content or reducing the Ni particle size is generally helpful for improving the electrochemical performance, but the increased Ni content reduces the mechanical stability.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The suitable Ni content is thus obtained.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The LSM content is inconsequential to the mechanical stability and should be determined by achieving high electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Properly designed mtSOFCs are shown to provide high current outputs.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, mtSOFC is a promising technology with both the benefits of planar SOFC for high current density and tubular SOFC for thermal cycling endurance.
Titulo: Theoretical studies on the electrochemical and mechanical properties and microstructure optimization of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells
